what: A User-Friendly shiny Application for Exploring Associations and Visual Patterns
title: A User-Friendly shiny Application for Exploring Associations and Visual Patterns
text: AssociationExplorer2 R package provides Shiny application exploring statistical associations within multivariate datasets. app offers interactive tools examining relationships variables, including: correlation networks bivariate visualizations (numeric–numeric, numeric–categorical, categorical–categorical) summary tables describing variable distributions application supports optional survey weights range-based filters association strengths, making suitable exploring complex survey-based datasets.

title: A User-Friendly shiny Application for Exploring Associations and Visual Patterns
A User-Friendly shiny Application for Exploring Associations and Visual Patterns
A User-Friendly shiny Application for Exploring Associations and Visual Patterns
text: can launch Shiny application using following command: opens interactive Shiny interface default web browser.

title: A User-Friendly shiny Application for Exploring Associations and Visual Patterns
text: Correlation networks Visualize associations variables using weighted network diagrams. Supports numeric–numeric, numeric–categorical, categorical–categorical associations. Bivariate visualizations Generate scatter plots, mean plots, contingency tables depending variable types. Survey weights Users may optionally specify survey weight variable. Weighted statistics associations computed applicable. Range-based association filtering Instead setting single cutoff threshold, users can filter associations based minimum maximum ranges. Data upload interface Users can load datasets common formats (CSV, Excel). CSV files, separator must comma (,) decimals must use dot (.). small demonstration dataset included package.

title: A User-Friendly shiny Application for Exploring Associations and Visual Patterns
text: Upload dataset interface, select variables interest, adjust thresholds weights, explore resulting association structures.

title: A User-Friendly shiny Application for Exploring Associations and Visual Patterns

AssociationExplorer2 0.1.6
text: Added pkgdown configuration GitHub Actions workflow site builds. Updated ignored files exclude pkgdown outputs site artifacts. Added public pkgdown website URL package metadata. functional changes package code Shiny application.

title: AssociationExplorer2 0.1.1 to 0.1.5
text: Updated Title field DESCRIPTION file meet CRAN Title Case requirements. Revised Authors@R field remove deprecated comment elements. Updated inst/CITATION file use bibentry() instead deprecated citEntry(). Clarified CSV input format requirements user interface documentation (comma-separated values dot decimals). functional changes package code Shiny application.

title: AssociationExplorer2 0.1.0
text: First published version AssociationExplorer2 package. Provides interactive Shiny application exploring statistical associations. Correlation networks numeric–numeric, numeric–categorical, categorical–categorical associations. Bivariate visualizations (scatter plots, mean plots, contingency tables). Support survey weights applicable computations [see https://github.com/AntoineSoetewey/AssociationExplorer2/commit/72725331a2b461f534355eb4b65051e088efb471]. Range-based filtering association strengths (minimum maximum thresholds) [see https://github.com/AntoineSoetewey/AssociationExplorer2/commit/ed89fc139b4d3c2e818a25a7a98c9d48b720f386]. Data upload interface supporting CSV Excel files. Includes small demonstration dataset testing illustration. Provides run_associationexplorer() function launch application.
